errors.error_description: The provided pip command `pip install powderday --nodeps` uses an incorrect flag. The correct flag is `--no-deps`, causing the command to fail.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `pip install powderday --no-dependencies`.
Correct the command to `pip install powderday --no-deps`.
Change the command to `pip install powderday --ignore-installed`.
The command should be `pip install powderday` without any flags, as dependencies should be handled by pip.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the command to `pip install powderday --no-deps`.
